meanings: (날짜·일정 등을) delay, postpone, put off, put back, hold off (on), defer, (formal) procrastinate (=연기하다)
(책임·잘못 등을) shift blame[responsibility], lay[put, place] blame on (=전가하다)
(짐작·추측하다) guess, judge by[from], infer (sth from sth), (formal) surmise
delay payment time and again on one pretext or another

vlive.korean: 내가 더 미루고 미루다 보면 이거 그래비티콘 끝날... I thought the "Gravity" concert would be over if I postpone again. 듣기 View video DAY6 : Young K in BangKok
vlive.english: I thought the "Gravity" concert would be over if I postpone again.

vlive.korean: [늦었으니 걱정은 잠시 미루고! 잘 준비합시다~] 이제 씻고 준비하면서 생각을 해서... Let's think about it while getting ready to wash up... 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 9부_ep.1 아침을 깨우는 모닝엔젤의 정체?! (ft.벌칙)
vlive.english: Let's think about it while getting ready to wash up...

vlive.korean: 조금 미루고 있네요. So, I'm postponing it. 듣기 View video INFINITE : 호야 뜻밖의 꿈방♣
잠시 밥시간을 미루고 있습니다. so I can chat with you. 듣기 View video wellmade yedang : [이선빈] 드라마 '38사기동대' 촬영 현장!! ('조미주'가 궁금하다면 함께해요~:D)
vlive.english: so I can chat with you.

vlive.korean: 지금 다 미루고 계세요. They're pointing out each other. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 홍주연의 스타일핏 엑서사이즈: 뒤태 완전 정복, 등 & 팔 운동Luna Hong Stylefit Exercise

examples.korean: [+ -ing] He keeps putting off going to the dentist. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 치과에 가는 일을 계속 미루고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: [+ -ing] He keeps putting off going to the dentist. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Tell me the main points now; leave the details till later. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지금은 주요 사항들만 말씀해 주세요. 세부적인 것들은 나중으로 미루고. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Tell me the main points now; leave the details till later. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He delayed telling her the news, waiting for the right moment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그녀에게 그 소식을 전하는 것을 뒤로 미루고 적절한 때를 기다렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He delayed telling her the news, waiting for the right moment. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Regarding the MOU, did you mean that you would like to hold off on it? 듣기 Add to Wordbook MOU말인데요, 그것을 미루고 싶다는 것이 귀하의 뜻이었나요? DARAKWON
examples.english: Regarding the MOU, did you mean that you would like to hold off on it? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Procrastibaking is a habit of mine. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 할 일을 미루고 빵을 굽는 것은 내 습관이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Procrastibaking is a habit of mine. Add to Wordbook
